dmca.title: Shopforphones.co.uk Asks Google to Remove Links (#1)
dmca.body:
18 September 2004 01:03	+44 1234 311420

[private]
[private]
[private]
Bedford
MK41 OAA
United Kingdom
18th September 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam,

1.The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on several pages: 

a. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/motorola-v975.htm 
b. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/motorola-v555.htm 
c. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/motorola-razr-v3.htm 
d. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/samsung-x900.htm 
e. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/siemens-sk65.htm

The search query and web pages with the unauthorized material are:
a. Search Query: MOTOROLA V975
Infringing Web Page: http://cellular.co.za/phones/motorola/2004/motorola_v975_3g.htm
b. Search Query: MOTOROLA V555
Infringing Web Page:
http://cellular.co.za/phones/motorola/2004/motorola_v555_gsmedge.htm
c. Search Query: MOTOROLA RAZR V3
Infringing Web Page: http://cellular.co.za/phones/motorola/2004/motorola_razr_v3.htm
d Search Query: SAMSUNG X900
Infringing Web Page: http://www.cellular.co.za/phones/samsung/2004/samsung_x900.htm
e. Search Query: SIEMENS SK65
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.cellular.co.za/phones/siemens/2004/siemens_sk65.htm

3. My contact information: [private]@dynamoo.com

4. Infringer's Contact Information [private], [private], Cape Town, 8002, South Africa 
[private]@cellular.co.za

5. I, [private], have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above 
on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[private], Site Owner, shopforphones. co.uk
Phone:	[private]
Fax:	[private]
Email:	[private]@dynamoo.com
